thread.title: 49ers Fan Runs On the Field During Giants-Niners Game, Gets Tackled, Headbutts Cop
thread.title_full: 49ers Fan Runs On the Field During Giants-Niners Game, Gets Tackled, Headbutts Cop | Complex

author: Jordan Zirm
title: 49ers Fan Runs On the Field During Giants-Niners Game, Gets Tackled, Headbutts Cop
text:
Fan who ran on the field is going to have a fun night in the slammer pic.twitter.com/th1UZYqqWA
â€” NFL_Central (@Central_NFL) October 12, 2015 MetLife Stadium fell victim to a fan running on to the field during the third quarter of the New York Giants and San Francisco 49ers Sunday night matchup, and our man wasn't going down without a fight.
Appearing to be a 49ers fan judging by his bright red jersey, the fan was immediately tackled by 5-6 state troopers before being marched to the exit. That didn't stop the fan from jabbing his head backwards in an effort to headbutt the cop directly behind him, and he succeeded in knocking the guy's hat off, which led to another tackling. He wasn't quite done, though, flailing his body and hopping around before the cops just gave up and had an officer grab each leg and arm and carry him out like he was a mental patient. Here's a another angle:

â€” Gone Studying (@Hayes_Hair13) October 12, 2015 Ah, football. Ain't it great?
[Via Twitter]
